summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CryptoVault enterprise frontend with version sync system. Backend APIs working correctly, version sync endpoints functional, frontend loads with responsive components but has onboarding loader display issue.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns CSRF token error instead of 401 for unauthenticated requests
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - authentication flow still works correctly

ui_bugs.issue: Loader remains visible in screenshot despite JavaScript indicating page has loaded
ui_bugs.impact: Visual issue - functionality works but user experience affected
ui_bugs.details: Page content loads correctly (navigation, hero, buttons, responsive elements) but onboarding loader overlay persists visually

integration_issues.issue: Frontend configured to use production Fly.io URLs instead of localhost for testing
integration_issues.workaround: Version sync endpoints accessible via relative paths

working_features: Hero section and interactive elements (21 buttons, 56 links)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix onboarding loader display issue - loader should hide after successful initialization. The page content loads correctly but the loader overlay remains visible. Also consider adding localhost configuration for development testing.

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (version sync working, responsive layout working, but loader display issue)
